resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105713</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105713</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202801</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Diction in Maya Angelou's poem, "Remembering"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diktion im Gedicht Maya Angelous, "erinnernd"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prononciation en poésie d'Angelou de Maya, "se 
rappelant"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diction no poema de Angelou do maya, "recordando"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diction in poem del Angelou del maya, 
"ricordandosi"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Diction maya Angelou στο ποίημα, "θυσμένοσ"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dicción en el poema de Angelou del maya, 
"recordando"</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The class will annotate and discuss Angelou's poem. Then they will select specific words and complete a webbing that asks them to explore the connotations of the word as well as consider the author's purpose in using it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kategorie kommentiert und behandelt Gedicht 
Angelous. Dann wählen sie spezifische Wörter aus und ein 
gewebtes Material durchzuführen, das sie bittet, zu erforschen die 
Konnotationen des Wortes sowie, betrachten Sie den Zweck des Autors, 
wenn Sie ihn verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La classe annotera et discutera la poésie 
d'Angelou. Alors ils choisiront des mots spécifiques et 
terminer une sangle aussi bien que laquelle les demande d'explorer les
connotations du mot considérez le but de l'auteur en l'utilisant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A classe anotará e discutirá o poema de Angelou.
Então selecionarão palavras específicas e para terminar um 
webbing que peça que explorem os connotations da palavra as.well.as 
considere a finalidade do autor em usá-la.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il codice categoria annoterà e discuterà il poem
del Angelou. Allora selezioneranno le parole specifiche e 
completare una tessitura che chiede loro di esplorare le connotazioni 
della parola così come consideri lo scopo dell'autore nel usando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κλάση θα σχολιάσει και θα συζητήσει το ποίημα 
Angelou. Κατόπιν θα επιλέξουν τις συγκεκριμένες λέξεις 
και θα ολοκληρώσουν webbing που τους ζητά για να ερευνήσει τις 
υποδηλώσεις της λέξης καθώς επίσης και να εξετάσει το σκοπό του 
συντάκτη σε χρησιμοποίηση του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La clase anotará y discutirá el poema de 
Angelou. Entonces seleccionarán palabras específicas y 
terminar las correas así como las cuales pide que exploren las 
connotaciones de la palabra considere el propósito del autor al 
usarlo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:VICKIE SMITH
FN:VICKIE SMITH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202801</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105713</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/diction-in-maya-angelous-poem-remembering</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
